settings.title: Does Gecko theme support section
settings.text: Of course, Gecko support section with drag & Drop

settings.title: Does this theme have variant dropdown options?
settings.text: Yes, our theme support variant dropdown options.

settings.title: Does Gecko support one click install ?
settings.text: yes, Gecko support one click import demo config, that mean you just need click to choose the layout. After that, you need config banner, products you want to show !

settings.title: How can the footer be changed?
settings.text: With Footer, after you import the demo layout, it already have Footer layout here. We supported a few block type and you can create unlimited Footer layout.

settings.title: Can I look at your documentation? do you have this online somewhere?
settings.text: Yes, you can check it from https://the4.co

settings.title: Will it be possible to increase the number of rows of products for the fashion homepage
settings.text: My answer is YES

settings.title: Is there any way Is to adjust the logo on mobile?
settings.text: yes, you can add the custom CSS and paste to Custom CSS with Mobile screen

settings.title: If i want to have 2 languge in my website (English and Arabic ) is your theme support that with simple one click for the client ?
settings.text: You can use Langify app to have it

settings.title: I just purchased this theme and when I upload it to shopify I get this error,  zip does not contain a valid theme: missing template “layout/theme.liquid”, missing template “templates/index.liquid”, missing template “templates/collection.liquid”, missing template “templates/product.liquid”, missing template “templates/page.liquid”, missing template “templates/cart.liquid”, and missing template “templates/blog.liquid”
settings.text: You need extract download package first before upload theme file.

settings.title: Is it possible to have a different banner (and text) above each collection?
settings.text: Yes, you can

settings.title: How is your support system, you guys provide support if find any issue in theme?
settings.text: Yes, we can support you direct by email or you can post your question to our forum here: https://the4.co/forums/

settings.title: Is it possible to show a live search form in mobile header?
settings.text: Yes, it's possible :)

settings.title: My “registration” and “my account” page isn’t working. How do I activate it ?
settings.text: you need go to Setting > Checkout and check to require customer create account, it will work Thank you

settings.title: Does Gecko theme support section
settings.text: Of course, Gecko support section with drag & Drop

settings.title: Does this theme have variant dropdown options?
settings.text: Yes, our theme support variant dropdown options.

settings.title: Does Gecko support one click install ?
settings.text: yes, Gecko support one click import demo config, that mean you just need click to choose the layout. After that, you need config banner, products you want to show !

settings.title: How can the footer be changed?
settings.text: With Footer, after you import the demo layout, it already have Footer layout here. We supported a few block type and you can create unlimited Footer layout.

settings.title: Can I look at your documentation? do you have this online somewhere?
settings.text: Yes, you can check it from https://the4.co

settings.title: Will it be possible to increase the number of rows of products for the fashion homepage
settings.text: My answer is YES

settings.title: Is there any way Is to adjust the logo on mobile?
settings.text: yes, you can add the custom CSS and paste to Custom CSS with Mobile screen

settings.title: If i want to have 2 languge in my website (English and Arabic ) is your theme support that with simple one click for the client ?
settings.text: You can use Langify app to have it

settings.title: I just purchased this theme and when I upload it to shopify I get this error,  zip does not contain a valid theme: missing template “layout/theme.liquid”, missing template “templates/index.liquid”, missing template “templates/collection.liquid”, missing template “templates/product.liquid”, missing template “templates/page.liquid”, missing template “templates/cart.liquid”, and missing template “templates/blog.liquid”
settings.text: You need extract download package first before upload theme file.

settings.title: Is it possible to have a different banner (and text) above each collection?
settings.text: Yes, you can

settings.title: How is your support system, you guys provide support if find any issue in theme?
settings.text: Yes, we can support you direct by email or you can post your question to our forum here: https://the4.co/forums/

settings.title: Is it possible to show a live search form in mobile header?
settings.text: Yes, it's possible :)

settings.text: you need go to Setting > Checkout and check to require customer create account, it will work Thank you

settings.title: Does Gecko theme support section
settings.text: Of course, Gecko support section with drag & Drop

settings.title: Does this theme have variant dropdown options?
settings.text: Yes, our theme support variant dropdown options.

settings.title: Does Gecko support one click install ?
settings.text: yes, Gecko support one click import demo config, that mean you just need click to choose the layout. After that, you need config banner, products you want to show !

settings.title: How can the footer be changed?
settings.text: With Footer, after you import the demo layout, it already have Footer layout here. We supported a few block type and you can create unlimited Footer layout.

settings.title: Can I look at your documentation? do you have this online somewhere?
settings.text: Yes, you can check it from https://the4.co

settings.title: Will it be possible to increase the number of rows of products for the fashion homepage
settings.text: My answer is YES

settings.title: Is there any way Is to adjust the logo on mobile?
settings.text: yes, you can add the custom CSS and paste to Custom CSS with Mobile screen

settings.title: If i want to have 2 languge in my website (English and Arabic ) is your theme support that with simple one click for the client ?
settings.text: You can use Langify app to have it

settings.title: I just purchased this theme and when I upload it to shopify I get this error,  zip does not contain a valid theme: missing template “layout/theme.liquid”, missing template “templates/index.liquid”, missing template “templates/collection.liquid”, missing template “templates/product.liquid”, missing template “templates/page.liquid”, missing template “templates/cart.liquid”, and missing template “templates/blog.liquid”
settings.text: You need extract download package first before upload theme file.

settings.title: Is it possible to have a different banner (and text) above each collection?
settings.text: Yes, you can

settings.title: How is your support system, you guys provide support if find any issue in theme?
settings.text: Yes, we can support you direct by email or you can post your question to our forum here: https://the4.co/forums/

settings.title: Is it possible to show a live search form in mobile header?
settings.text: Yes, it's possible :)

settings.title: My “registration” and “my account” page isn’t working. How do I activate it ?
settings.text: you need go to Setting > Checkout and check to require customer create account, it will work Thank you

settings.title: Does this theme have variant dropdown options?
settings.text: Yes, our theme support variant dropdown options.

settings.title: Does Gecko support one click install ?
settings.text: yes, Gecko support one click import demo config, that mean you just need click to choose the layout. After that, you need config banner, products you want to show !

settings.title: How can the footer be changed?
settings.text: With Footer, after you import the demo layout, it already have Footer layout here. We supported a few block type and you can create unlimited Footer layout.

settings.title: Can I look at your documentation? do you have this online somewhere?
settings.text: Yes, you can check it from https://the4.co

settings.title: Will it be possible to increase the number of rows of products for the fashion homepage
settings.text: My answer is YES

settings.title: Is there any way Is to adjust the logo on mobile?
settings.text: yes, you can add the custom CSS and paste to Custom CSS with Mobile screen

settings.title: If i want to have 2 languge in my website (English and Arabic ) is your theme support that with simple one click for the client ?
settings.text: You can use Langify app to have it

settings.title: I just purchased this theme and when I upload it to shopify I get this error,  zip does not contain a valid theme: missing template “layout/theme.liquid”, missing template “templates/index.liquid”, missing template “templates/collection.liquid”, missing template “templates/product.liquid”, missing template “templates/page.liquid”, missing template “templates/cart.liquid”, and missing template “templates/blog.liquid”
settings.text: You need extract download package first before upload theme file.

settings.title: Is it possible to have a different banner (and text) above each collection?
settings.text: Yes, you can

settings.title: How is your support system, you guys provide support if find any issue in theme?
settings.text: Yes, we can support you direct by email or you can post your question to our forum here: https://the4.co/forums/

settings.title: Is it possible to show a live search form in mobile header?
settings.text: Yes, it's possible :)

settings.title: My “registration” and “my account” page isn’t working. How do I activate it ?
settings.text: you need go to Setting > Checkout and check to require customer create account, it will work Thank you

settings.title: Does Gecko theme support section
settings.text: Of course, Gecko support section with drag & Drop

settings.title: Does this theme have variant dropdown options?
settings.text: Yes, our theme support variant dropdown options.

settings.title: Does Gecko support one click install ?
settings.text: yes, Gecko support one click import demo config, that mean you just need click to choose the layout. After that, you need config banner, products you want to show !

settings.title: How can the footer be changed?
settings.text: With Footer, after you import the demo layout, it already have Footer layout here. We supported a few block type and you can create unlimited Footer layout.

settings.title: Can I look at your documentation? do you have this online somewhere?
settings.text: Yes, you can check it from https://the4.co

settings.title: Will it be possible to increase the number of rows of products for the fashion homepage
settings.text: My answer is YES

settings.title: Is there any way Is to adjust the logo on mobile?
settings.text: yes, you can add the custom CSS and paste to Custom CSS with Mobile screen

settings.title: If i want to have 2 languge in my website (English and Arabic ) is your theme support that with simple one click for the client ?
settings.text: You can use Langify app to have it

settings.title: I just purchased this theme and when I upload it to shopify I get this error,  zip does not contain a valid theme: missing template “layout/theme.liquid”, missing template “templates/index.liquid”, missing template “templates/collection.liquid”, missing template “templates/product.liquid”, missing template “templates/page.liquid”, missing template “templates/cart.liquid”, and missing template “templates/blog.liquid”
settings.text: You need extract download package first before upload theme file.

settings.title: Is it possible to have a different banner (and text) above each collection?
settings.text: Yes, you can

settings.title: How is your support system, you guys provide support if find any issue in theme?
settings.text: Yes, we can support you direct by email or you can post your question to our forum here: https://the4.co/forums/

settings.title: Is it possible to show a live search form in mobile header?
settings.text: Yes, it's possible :)

settings.title: My “registration” and “my account” page isn’t working. How do I activate it ?
settings.text: you need go to Setting > Checkout and check to require customer create account, it will work Thank you
